mapper.sql: ID, ISAPPOINTMENT, ISEARLY, APPOINTMENTTIME, SQUENCE, DEPTID, CREATETIME
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from SQUENCE_INFO i where to_char(i.createtime,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(#{nowdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and i.status=1 and i.deptid=#{deptid} and i.businesstype in (${businesstype})
select * from SQUENCE_INFO i where to_char(i.createtime,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(#{nowdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and i.status=1
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_SEQENCE_INFO_ID.nextval as id from dual
insert into SQUENCE_INFO (ID, ISAPPOINTMENT, ISEARLY, APPOINTMENTTIME, SQUENCE, DEPTID) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isappointment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isearly,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appointmenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{squence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

select SEQ_SEQENCE_INFO_ID.nextval as id from dual
insert into SQUENCE_INFO
ID,
ISAPPOINTMENT,
ISEARLY,
APPOINTMENTTIME,
SQUENCE,
DEPTID,
CREATETIME,
status,
openid,
cardnumber,
timeQuantum,

mapper.update:
update SQUENCE_INFO
ISAPPOINTMENT = #{isappointment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISEARLY = #{isearly,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPOINTMENTTIME = #{appointmenttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQUENCE = #{squence,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
